DOC.brief_summary: The aim research explore cognitive function would affect job tenure among people schizophrenia . The investigator plan recruit 60 people diagnose schizophrenia divide two group , employment unemployment . The investigator use several cognitive function test collect cognitive function PANSS evaluate psychotic symptom . And investigator compare analysis data statistic software . Finally , investigator answer cognitive function would affect job tenure among people schizophrenia . And investigator hope could get predict factor cognitive function predict successful employment future .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Functioning Related Job Tenure Among Patients With Schizophrenia
